title: Which free OCR software can read a handwriting? - Quora

response.answer_text: SimpleOCR is free and capable of reading handwritten files, it is for Windows. Here is a list of its main features: OCR scans, PDF and image;OCR printed and handwritten files;Rotate files before OCR;Spell check;OCR file to Word or TXT;But it cannot preserve the formatting very well.  If you are looking for more free OCR software, you can refer to this list:10 Best Free OCR Software for 2020 (100% Free and Offline)

I am not sure if there’s a very good one available or, if there is, if it’s free, but it may be worth looking at this discussion, where several tools have been mentioned: What is the best OCR for converting handwritten documents into text?
